    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Duration
    interval()
    Returns 10 milliseconds in a Duration object for the interval between element searches.
    static Duration
    loopInterval()
    Returns 100 milliseconds in a Duration object for the interval between element searches and interactions.
    static Duration
    out()
    Returns the value set in the timeout property in seconds, or a default of 10 seconds if nothing was configured.
    static void
    reset()
    Resets the timeout value so it will be re-read from the configuration.
    static void
    wait(double seconds)
    Wait functionality that takes a double in seconds and converts it to milliseconds before waiting.

  • Method Details

    • wait

      public static void wait(double seconds)
      Wait functionality that takes a double in seconds and converts it to milliseconds before waiting.
      Parameters:
      seconds - double number of seconds or fraction thereof (up to milliseconds 10^-3) to wait.

    • out

      public static Duration out()
      Returns the value set in the timeout property in seconds, or a default of 10 seconds if nothing was configured.
      Returns:
      Duration the timeout as a Java Duration object that can be used to get different values

    • interval

      public static Duration interval()
      Returns 10 milliseconds in a Duration object for the interval between element searches.
      Returns:
      Duration the interval to wait between searches

    • loopInterval

      public static Duration loopInterval()
      Returns 100 milliseconds in a Duration object for the interval between element searches and interactions.
      Returns:
      Duration the interval to loop for when searching / interacting with elements.

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Resets the timeout value so it will be re-read from the configuration.
